context_details.context_description: for all clients whose age == 18 and street == 'that'
context_details.context_postfix: { dup age 18 == { pop street 'that' streq } over if if } clients forall pop
client cve allocate execute deallocate pop
true cvb allocate execute deallocate pop
currentdate cvd allocate execute deallocate pop

context_details.context_description: local string Things2 = 'This is a string'
context_details.context_postfix: 'This is a string' cvs allocate execute deallocate pop

action_details.action_description: for all clients set eligible = true
for each case in job.cases set eligible=true
for each case in job.cases where city=='spokane' set eligible=true
action_details.action_postfix: { { true cvb /eligible xdef } city 'spokane' streq if } job.cases forallr

action_details.action_description: for all clients where age < 18 set eligible=false
action_details.action_postfix: { { false cvb /eligible xdef } age 18 < if } clients forallr

action_details.action_description: for each case and its address in job.cases set applying = true
action_details.action_postfix: { address entitypush true cvb /applying xdef entitypop } job.cases forallr

action_details.action_description: for each case and its address in job.cases where validatedCitizenship == false set eligible = false
action_details.action_postfix: { address entitypush { false cvb /eligible xdef } validatedCitizenship false beq if entitypop } job.cases forallr

context_details.context_description: for first of job.cases where validatedCitizenship == true
context_details.context_postfix: dup { validatedCitizenship true beq } job.cases forfirst pop

context_details.context_description: for first of job.cases and its case where city == 'New York'
context_details.context_postfix: { case entitypush dup execute entitypop } { case entitypush city 'New York' streq entitypop } job.cases forfirst pop

context_details.context_description: for first in job.cases where validatedCitizenship == false
context_details.context_postfix: dup { validatedCitizenship false beq } job.cases forfirst pop

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: for first of job.cases where age < 18 then set eligible = true; else if none are found set eligible = false
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: { true cvb /eligible xdef } { false cvb /eligible xdef } { age 18 < } job.cases forfirstelse

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: for first of job.cases and its case where city == 'New York' then set eligible = false; else if none are found set eligible = true
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: { case entitypush false cvb /eligible xdef entitypop } { true cvb /eligible xdef } { case entitypush city 'New York' streq entitypop } job.cases forfirstelse

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: { for all clients where age > 18 set eligible = true }
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: { { true cvb /eligible xdef } age 18 > if } clients forallr

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: add mailingaddress if not member to locations
add client_ID if not member to cases
add client to context of this table
add client to context for this table
remove each client from clients where age < 18
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: clients { { dup 0 entityfetch remove pop } age 18 < if } over forallr pop

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: sort clients in ascending order by $steve
sort clients in descending order by $steve
set cases = get copy of interestingCases
set cases = get deep copy of interestingCases
set interestingClients = deep copy of clients
set errorcodes = tokenize errorType by location

initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: client entitypush address entitypop cve /client xdef

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: set client = first client in clients where age < 18
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: { client } { null } { age 18 < } clients forfirstelse cve /client xdef

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: set client = first client where pregnant == true
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: { client } { null } { pregnant true beq } clients forfirstelse cve /client xdef
{ source } { null } { gender type == } forfirstelse cve /client xdef
client entitypush currentDate entitypop cvd /effectiveDate xdef

initial_action_details.initial_action_description: set effectiveDate = subtract 1 year from currentDate
set effectiveDate = subtract 9 months from currentDate
set effectiveDate = subtract 22 days from currentDate
set effectiveDate = add 2 years to currentDate
set effectiveDate = add 8 months to currentDate
set effectiveDate = add 14 days to currentDate
set currentDate = first of year of effectiveDate
set currentDate = first of month of effectiveDate
set currentDate = end of month of effectiveDate
set effectiveDate = earliest of cases after currentDate
initial_action_details.initial_action_postfix: currentDate dup >r { { pop pop i i } over i d> if pop } cases dup false sortarray for r> pop cvd /effectiveDate xdef

action_details.action_description: set street = attribute street of client
set street = attribute street of client
set programLevel = substring of program from 0 to 10

action_details.action_postfix: client entitypush street entitypop cvs /street xdef

action_details.action_description: set totalIncome = absolute value of totalIncome

action_details.action_postfix: clients entitypush totalIncome entitypop cvr /totalIncome xdef

action_details.action_description: set DateNumber = get days in months for effectiveDate
set DateNumber = get days of months for effectiveDate
set DateNumber = get days in months for effectiveDate
set totalGroupIncome = number of clients where age > 18
action_details.action_postfix: 0 { { 1 ladd } age 18 > if }clients forall cvi /totalGroupIncome xdef

action_details.action_description: set DateNumber = get days in months for effectiveDate
set DateNumber = index of birthday in importantDates
set totalGroupIncome = absolute value of totalGroupIncome

action_details.action_postfix: client entitypush IncomeGroupCount entitypop cvi /totalGroupIncome xdef

action_details.action_description: set DateNumber = days from currentDate to effectiveDate
set DateNumber = months from currentDate to effectiveDate
set DateNumber = years from currentDate to effectiveDate
set eligible = clients does not include case
action_details.action_postfix: clients case memberof not cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = clients does include case
set applying = there is match for all clients to $applying in cases
action_details.action_postfix: true { over { { } { swap pop false swap } { dup /applying execute streq } cases forfirstelse } swap if pop } clients for cvb /applying xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = there is client where FPL_base <867
action_details.action_postfix: { true } { false } { FPL_base 867 < } clients forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = is there mailingAddress in the Address where mailingAddress == billingAddress
action_details.action_postfix: { true } { false } { mailingAddress billingAddress req } mailingAddresss Address entitypush forfirstelse entitypop cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = there is no client where applying == false
action_details.action_postfix: { false } { true } { applying false beq } clients forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = there is no client in the case where applying == false
action_details.action_postfix: { false } { true } { applying false beq } clients case entitypush forfirstelse entitypop cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = there is no case in the clients where client_FPL > 1000
action_details.action_postfix: { false } { true } { client_FPL 1000 > } clients forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = all clients have disabled == true
action_details.action_postfix: { false } { true } { disabled true beq not } clients forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = one of clients has a FPL_Base > 867
action_details.action_postfix: { true } { false } { FPL_Base 867 > } clients forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = client does not have SocialSecurity
action_details.action_postfix: SocialSecurity client { pop pop false } { pop pop true } { over type streq over target req and } relationships forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = client has a Wages
action_details.action_postfix: Wages client { pop pop true } { pop pop false } { over type streq over target req and } relationships forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = case has a FreeCoverage where FPL_Base < 867
action_details.action_postfix: FreeCoverage case { pop pop true } { pop pop false } { over type streq over target req and source entitypush FPL_Base 867 < entitypop and } relationships forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = client is programLevel of case
action_details.action_postfix: programLevel { pop true } { pop false } { dup type streq source client req and target case req and } relationships forfirstelse cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = additionalIncome is within 20 percent of totalIncome
action_details.action_postfix: totalIncome additionalIncome 20 100.0 f/ over f* swap >r >r >r i j f- k f< r> r> f+ r> f> and cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = totalIncome is plus or minus 300 of additionalIncome
action_details.action_postfix: additionalIncome 300 totalIncome >r >r >r i j f- k f< r> r> f+ r> f> and cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = IncomeGroupCount is equal to totalGroupIncome
set eligible = totalIncome equal to totalGroupIncome
set eligible = IncomeGroupCount is not equal to totalGroupIncome
set eligible = totalIncome not equal to totalGroupIncome
action_details.action_postfix: totalIncome totalGroupIncome f== not cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = IncomeGroupCount is greater than totalGroupIncome
set eligible = totalIncome greater than totalGroupIncome
set eligible = IncomeGroupCount is greater than or equal to totalGroupIncome
set eligible = totalIncome greater than or equal to totalGroupIncome
set eligible = IncomeGroupCount is less than totalGroupIncome
set eligible = totalIncome less than totalGroupIncome
set eligible = IncomeGroupCount is less than or equal to totalGroupIncome
set eligible = totalIncome less than or equal to totalGroupIncome

action_details.action_postfix: program programLevel streq not cvb /eligible xdef

action_details.action_description: set eligible = client_ID starts with programLevel
set eligible = client_ID is one of clients
set eligible = client_ID is not one of clients
action_details.action_postfix: clients client_ID memberof not cvb /eligible xdef
